alias: Mandatory. Unique identificator for each sample. This is used to link experiments to the samples.
title: Mandatory. Short text that can be used to call out sample records in search results or in displays.
scientific_name: Mandatory. Scientific name of sample that distinguishes its taxonomy.  Please use a name or synonym that is tracked in the INSDC Taxonomy database. Also, this field can be used to confirm the TAXON_ID setting.
sample_description: Mandatory. Free-form text describing the sample, its origin, and its method of isolation.
tissue_type: Mandatory. Tissue type from which the sample was obtained
sex: Mandatory. Sex of the organism from which the sample was obtained
date of birth: Recommended. Date of birth of subject the sample was derived from.
date of death: Recommended. Date of death of subject the sample was derived from.
diagnosis: Mandatory. The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation (http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/evs/thesaurus.owl#c15220).
strain: Mandatory. Name of the strain from which the sample was obtained.
tumor grading (OBI_0600002): Recommended. Determination of the grade (severity/stage) of a tumor sample, used in cancer biology to describe abnormalities/qualities of tumor cells or tissues. Values can be described by terms from nci thesaurus.
treatment agent: Recommended. The name of the treatment agent used.
treatment dose: Recommended. The dose of the treatment agent used.. Units: femtomolar, micromolar, millimolar, molar, nanomolar, picomolar
treatment date: Recommended. The date of the treatment applied.
Further Details: Optional. Reference details related to a sample in form of an uri.
